mapper.select: SELECT no, host_name, name, price, address, capa, parking, category_no, type_no, rep_image, num FROM (SELECT no, host_name, name, price, address, capa, parking, category_no, type_no, rep_image, rownum as num FROM (SELECT no, host_name, name, price, address, capa, parking, category_no, type_no, rep_image FROM place_3 WHERE type_no = #{tno} ORDER BY no ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM place_3 WHERE type_no=#{tno}
select type from place_type_3 WHERE no=#{tno}
SELECT S.* FROM (SELECT * FROM place_3 order by SYS.dbms_random.value) S WHERE ROWNUM <=9
